CustomField.description: API name of the custom field on the Misc Adjustment object that is used to determine the monthly time period any Deliverable misc adjustments are added to. This enables you to control the month in which revenue or costs are placed.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: API name of the custom field on the Misc Adjustment object that is used to determine the monthly time period any Deliverable misc adjustments are added to. This enables you to control the month in which revenue or costs are placed.
CustomField.label: Custom Date for Deliverable Misc Adjusts
